meanings.sent1: After the rain, the ground was the soggiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The towel was the soggiest after being left out in the storm.
meanings.sent3: The soggiest sponge in the sink made a squishy sound when squeezed.
meanings.sent4: Her shoes were like the soggiest sponges, absorbing every drop of water.
meanings.sent5: The soggiest mud in the yard made it impossible to walk without sinking.

meanings.sent1: The soggiest mattress made it hard to get a good night's sleep.
meanings.sent2: The bread was the soggiest I had ever tasted, lacking any crunch.
meanings.sent3: His excuse for being late was as soggy as the soggiest cereal.
meanings.sent4: The soggiest cardboard box collapsed under the weight of the books.
meanings.sent5: The soggiest pillow offered no support, causing neck pain.

meanings.sent1: The paper was the soggiest, causing the ink to smudge.
meanings.sent2: The cake was the soggiest I had ever baked, dripping with moisture.
meanings.sent3: His socks were the soggiest, squelching with every step he took.
meanings.sent4: The plant's leaves were the soggiest, indicating overwatering.
meanings.sent5: The sandwich was the soggiest, making the bread fall apart.
